mapper.insert: insert into "Employees" (email, name, password, department_id, status, phone, hire_date) values (#{email}, #{name}, #{password}, #{departmentId}, #{status}, #{phone}, #{hireDate})
mapper.update: update "Employees" set email = #{email}, name = #{name}, password = #{password}, department_id = #{departmentId}, status = #{status}, phone = #{phone}, hire_date =#{hireDate} where id = #{id}
